sequela: Uncomplicated diabetes mellitus type 2
health_state_name: Generic uncomplicated disease: worry and daily medication
health_state_lay_description: has a chronic disease that requires medication every day and causes some worry but minimal interference with daily activities.

sequela: Moderate vision impairment due to diabetes mellitus type 2 retinopathy
health_state_lay_description: has vision problems that make it difficult to recognize faces or objects across a room.

sequela: Severe vision impairment due to diabetes mellitus type 2 retinopathy
health_state_lay_description: has severe vision loss, which causes difficulty in daily activities, some emotional impact (for example worry), and some difficulty going outside the home without assistance.

sequela: Blindness due to diabetes mellitus type 2 retinopathy
health_state_lay_description: is completely blind, which causes great difficulty in some daily activities, worry and anxiety, and great difficulty going outside the home without assistance.

sequela: Diabetic neuropathy due to diabetes mellitus type 2, without diabetic foot or amputation
health_state_lay_description: has pain, tingling and numbness in the arms, legs, hands and feet. The person sometimes gets cramps and muscle weakness.

sequela: Diabetic foot due to neuropathy due to diabetes mellitus type 2
Diabetic neuropathy and amputation with treatment due to diabetes mellitus type 2
Diabetic neuropathy and amputation without treatment due to diabetes mellitus type 2
Stage 1-2 chronic kidney disease with preserved GFR due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
End-stage renal disease after transplant due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: End-stage renal disease, with kidney transplant
health_state_lay_description: sometimes feels tired and down, and has some difficulty with daily activities.

sequela: End-stage renal disease on dialysis without anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_lay_description: is tired and has itching, cramps, headache, joint pains and shortness of breath. The person needs intensive medical care every other day lasting about half a day.

sequela: End-stage renal disease on dialysis and mild anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: End-stage renal disease, on dialysis and mild anemia

sequela: End-stage renal disease on dialysis and moderate anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: End-stage renal disease, on dialysis and moderate anemia

sequela: End-stage renal disease on dialysis and severe anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: End-stage renal disease, on dialysis and severe anemia

sequela: Stage 3 chronic kidney disease and mild anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_lay_description: feels slightly tired and weak at times, but this does not interfere with normal daily activities.

sequela: Stage 3 chronic kidney disease and moderate anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_lay_description: feels moderate fatigue, weakness, and shortness of breath after exercise, making daily activities more difficult.

sequela: Stage 3 chronic kidney disease and severe anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_lay_description: feels very weak, tired and short of breath, and has problems with activities that require physical effort or deep concentration.

sequela: Stage 3 chronic kidney disease without anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
Stage 4 chronic kidney disease untreated without anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_lay_description: tires easily, has nausea, reduced appetite and difficulty sleeping.

sequela: Stage 4 chronic kidney disease untreated and mild anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Mild anemia with Stage IV CKD

sequela: Stage 4 chronic kidney disease untreated and moderate anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Moderate anemia with Stage IV CKD

sequela: Stage 4 chronic kidney disease untreated and severe anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Severe anemia with Stage IV CKD

sequela: Stage 5 chronic kidney disease untreated without anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Terminal phase, without medication (for cancers, end-stage kidney/liver disease)
health_state_lay_description: has lost a lot of weight and has constant pain. The person has no appetite, feels nauseous, and needs to spend most of the day in bed.

sequela: Stage 5 chronic kidney disease untreated and mild anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Mild anemia and terminal phase, without medication (for cancers, end-stage kidney/liver disease)

sequela: Stage 5 chronic kidney disease untreated and moderate anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Moderate anemia and terminal phase, without medication (for cancers, end-stage kidney/liver disease)

sequela: Stage 5 chronic kidney disease untreated and severe anemia due to type 2 diabetes mellitus
health_state_name: Severe anemia and terminal phase, without medication (for cancers, end-stage kidney/liver disease)
